resources.string: Press the fab to list Fennec\'s internal storage files.\n This app assumes you have \'org.mozilla.firefox\' installed and signed with the same key
All the files in Fennec\'s internal storage:
Firefox seems to not be installed?
No backups are currently available. Please create or import a new backup.
Are you sure you want to delete this backup?
The name cannot be empty, please try again.
Please grant access to the storage permission in order to use this app.
The app with the same shared user id %s does not exist, please install it and try again
The backup has been applied successfully, please check the app.
This will overwrite the entire current state of the app, do you want to proceed?
Something went wrong, please try again later.
This does not seem to be a FPM backup.\nCannot import.
